title: Los Amigos - Atlantic City
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A second location of a long-established family-owned West Berlin Mexican restaurant that began adding more vegan choices in 2015. Now has labeled vegan choices on the specials. Also hosts monthly vegan events like a 5-course tasting menu (as of April 2016, price is $30.) Thur, Fri and Sun Happy Hour 4:00 pm - 7:00 pm.
